content: ऊह् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (ऊहति-ते, ऊहांचकार-वक्रे, ऊहितुं, ऊहित) {@--1@} To note, mark, observe. {@--2@} To guess, conjecture, infer; अनुक्तमप्यूहति पंडितो जनः <ls>Pt. 1. 43.</ls> {@--3@} To comprehend, conceive, perceive, expect; ऊहांचक्रे जयं न च <ls>Bk. 14. 72</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">3. 48</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 123.</ls> {@--4@} To reason, deliberate about. {@--5@} To reckon upon (with <ab>loc.</ab>). {@--6@} To wait for. {@--7@} To be regarded as. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To change or modify. {@--2@} To push, thrust, remove (with a prep.) {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to reason, think, infer or conjecture; <ls>Ki. 16. 19.</ls>
